alert.note: Alert for Muskegon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 12 at 10:08AM EDT until July 12 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Muskegon county. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The beach near the north pier at Muskegon State Park will have strong and dangerous currents.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
